main event: Residents of Berkeley, California, observed an unidentified flying object emitting a reddish-orange glow on May 26, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as being round in shape and approximately 30-40 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted for approximately 5-10 minutes., The object hovered above the city and moved erratically at high speed before disappearing., Initial observations suggested it might be a balloon or an aircraft., The object performed maneuvers impossible for any known aircraft.
sighted object: a round unidentified flying object emitting a reddish-orange glow
